kv20.3:6.1: Atthi manussesu kammakāraṇā, atthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:6.3: Atthi nirayesu kammakāraṇā, atthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:6.6: atthi nirayesu kammakāraṇā, natthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:6.8: Atthi manussesu kammakāraṇā, natthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:10.4: “tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ kārenti—
kv20.3:10.5: tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ dutiye hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ dutiye pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ majjheurasmiṃ gamenti;
kv20.3:10.6: so tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vedeti;
kv20.3:10.7: na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti.
kv20.3:11.4: “tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā saṃvesetvā kuṭhārīhi tacchanti … pe …
kv20.3:11.6: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṃ adhosiraṃ ṭhapetvā vāsīhi tacchanti … pe …
kv20.3:11.8: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā rathe yojetvā ādittāya pathaviyā sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya sārentipi paccāsārentipi … pe …
kv20.3:11.10: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā mahantaṃ aṅgārapabbataṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āropentipi oropentipi … pe …
kv20.3:11.12: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṃ adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya lohakumbhiyā pakkhipanti ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya.
kv20.3:11.13: So tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccati, so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriyaṃ gacchati.
kv20.3:11.14: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vedayati, na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhoti.
